data.title: Comedian Tommy Davidson Explains It All to Preston & Steve
data.meta_description: Tommy stopped by The Preston & Steve Show to promote his live comedy and music show at World Café Live as well as his recently released
data.text:
Whether it’s because you watched In Living Color in the 90s or the heard his voice on The Proud Family, chances are you’ve witnessed the hilarity of Tommy Davidson. What you may not have known is that the comedy icon is also a singer with several jazz and R&B singles available now for your listening pleasure.

Tommy stopped by The Preston & Steve Show to promote his live comedy and music show at World Café Live as well as his recently released autobiography. Always an open book himself, Davidson describes his humble beginnings with refreshing candor. Starting with being abandoned as a baby and being found in the garbage by his adoptive mother, Tommy tells his life story and shares his unique perspective on the human condition, racism, his comedy career, and his love of music.

The evening after the interview, Davidson invite Preston & Steve Video Producer, Kyle Maack, to join him on stage. Full story.

Recent Daily Rush Videos:

Marisa Magnatta, Producer at The Preston & Steve Show, has clocked-in two decades at 93.3 WMMR, Philly. She’s your source for everything Philly, concert, sports fan, restaurant or Preston & Steve Show related.
